name: Airbnb Stays
description: Find unique accommodations around the world, from cozy apartments to luxurious villas, offering a home-like experience for travelers.

name: Airbnb Luxe
description: Airbnb Luxe offers high-end vacation rentals, including private villas, luxury estates, and penthouses with world-class amenities and concierge services.

name: Airbnb Experiences
description: Airbnb Experiences connect travelers with local hosts who offer unique activities, from cooking classes and guided tours to outdoor adventures.

name: Airbnb Adventures
description: Multi-day trips designed by local experts, offering immersive travel experiences like hiking, safaris, and cultural tours in exotic locations.

name: Airbnb for Work
description: Business-friendly accommodations with workspaces, Wi-Fi, and long-term stay options, catering to corporate travelers and remote workers.

name: Airbnb Monthly Stays
description: Extended stays for a month or longer, offering discounts for digital nomads, students, and professionals seeking flexible housing options.

name: Airbnb Plus
description: A curated selection of high-quality homes that meet Airbnbâ€™s design, comfort, and hospitality standards, ensuring a superior stay experience.

name: Airbnb Host Protection Insurance
description: Airbnb provides insurance coverage for hosts against property damage and liability claims to ensure peace of mind when renting their space.

name: Airbnb Co-Hosting
description: A service that allows property owners to share hosting responsibilities with co-hosts who help manage bookings, guest interactions, and property maintenance.

name: Airbnb Online Experiences
description: Virtual experiences hosted by experts, offering activities like cooking classes, meditation sessions, and live cultural performances from around the world.
